subject: Haptics in Iracing
description_text:
Hello
I bought the van pro haptics for my pro x pedals.  I can get them to work
in the software manager but can’t get them to work in Iracing.  I have the
option selected to vibrate pedals on.  Is there something else?

Brian Pinnow
608 769 8354

conversations.body_text: Hi Brian Pinnow,     Currently, you can use SimHub version 9.9.3. Our SIMSONN Manager will officially support iRacing in version 2.0.9.  Please note that some games (such as iRacing) do not provide direct ABS or TC (traction control) data — SimHub uses calculations to simulate these effects.

I have simhub 9.9.3 but don’t see Simsonn listed for motors


Brian Pinnow
608 769 8354


On Sat, Jul 12, 2025 at 9:25 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi Brian Pinnow,  Please add the SIMSONN device in the Device interface.

Thank you

Brian Pinnow
608 769 8354


On Sat, Jul 12, 2025 at 9:46 AM support@simsonn.com

Also is there a way to get another 1 way hydrolic rod for my Pro x
throttle?  I had to remove it because it wouldn’t press all the way.

Brian Pinnow
608 769 8354


On Sat, Jul 12, 2025 at 9:46 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi Brian Pinnow,   Please provide your order number, shipping address, and contact person. I will arrange to send you a replacement unidirectional hydraulic rod on Monday.

Thank You
Attached is my receipt from amazon.

Brian Pinnow
N7169 Bice Ave
Holmen, WI 54636 USA

Brian Pinnow
769-8354


On Sat, Jul 12, 2025 at 7:17 PM support@simsonn.com
Hi Brian Pinnow,  I’ve already forwarded your information to our sales team, and they will handle it for you today.
Hi Brian Pinnow,  Hi, Here is the tracking number of the 1 way hydrolic rod JSEGJ1652828627YQ, you can track it via https://www.js-exp.com/EN/index.php?page=19
